@@ -1,6 +1,33 @@
 # The Minion Game
 <https://www.hackerrank.com/challenges/the-minion-game>
 
 # Solution
+```python
+def minion_game(string):
\ No newline at end of file
+    vowels = 'AEIOU'
+
+    s = []
+    k = []
+
+    for i in range(len(string)):
+        if string[i] not in vowels:
+            s.append(i)
+        else:
+            k.append(i)
+
+    stuart = 0
+    kevin = 0
+
+    for i in s:
+        stuart += (len(string) - i)
+    for i in k:
+        kevin += (len(string) - i)
+
+    if stuart > kevin:
+        print(f'Stuart {stuart}')
+    elif stuart < kevin:
+        print(f'Kevin {kevin}')
+    else:
+        print('Draw')
 ```
-```
+
